synopsis.text:
He edless and self-centered, high school freshman Kei Kurono finds himself in an unexpected predicament when he and his estranged childhood friend, Masaru Katou, are killed while attempting to save a man from an oncoming train. Instead of meeting their demise, they materialize in a mysterious apartment filled with strangers and a foreboding black orb known as GANTZ.

With no means of escape, the captives are coerced by GANTZ into participating in deadly missions to eradicate extraterrestrial beings. Armed with an array of futuristic weaponry and form-fitting suits, Kei, Masaru, and an unlikely group of allies must navigate these perilous encounters, where survival is anything but guaranteed.

As they struggle to make sense of their new reality and the true nature of GANTZ, the high-stakes battles reveal that this may just be the beginning of a twisted game. With lives hanging in the balance and an uncertain future ahead, the group must band together and fight for their chance at redemption and freedom.
